name: Adventure Mak
description:
Adventure Mak - Early Access

Title: Adventure Mak
Genre: Platformer, Adventure.
Platform: PC, Linux, HTML5, Android.
DEVELOPER: Aleksey Shevchenko
Game engine: Unreal Engine 4.
Expansion: Gamejolt, itch, Google Play, VK, Yandex Games.
Stage: Early Access.
Language: Russian, English.

Story:

The two brothers went on a long journey for an egg to prepare a delicious dinner for themselves. Join the challenging, fun and interesting adventure of prehistoric people. But be careful, dinosaurs live here.

Input:

1P.

[WASD] - Control the Player.
[Spacebar] - Jump.
[B] - Attack.

2P.

[Up, Down, Left, Right] - Control the Player.
[O] - Jump.
[P] - Attack.

Features:

NES game style.
Masterpiece soundtrack.
Beautiful visuals.
Local multiplayer.
Retro game references.

System Requirements PC:

OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 (Only 64-Bit).
Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core.
Memory: 1 GB RAM.
Video: GTS 250 or HD5670.
DirectX: Version 10-11.
Storage: 200 MB available space.
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360.

System Requirements Android:

OS: Android 4.4+
